casename: Re Flint Charles John Raffles QC
counsel: Vinodh Coomaraswamy and David Chan (Shook Lin & Bok) for the plaintiff; Cho Sooi Yoon for the Law Society; Eric Chin (Attorney Generals Chambers) for the Attorney General; Bernadette Balan and Kueh Ping Yang (Haridass Ho & Partners) for the 1st, 2nd, 6th, 8th, 9th, 10th, 12th, 13th, 14th and 27rd defendants
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Admissionad/ad hoc/Three-stage test for admission/Whether case of sufficient difficulty and complexity that local counsel unable to adequately and ably handle/Whether circumstances of case warranted court exercising discretion in favour of admission/Factors non-exhaustive/s 21(1) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 2000 Ed)
